fn.p: Competing interest statement: The authors declare no competing interest.
This article is a PNAS Direct Submission. M.C. is a guest editor invited by the Editorial Board.
Data deposition: All of the raw NGS data have been deposited in the Sequence Read Archive (SRA) at the National Center for Biotechnology Information (submission number SUB5200307).
This article contains supporting information online at https://www.pnas.org/lookup/suppl/doi:10.1073/pnas.1910113117/-/DCSupplemental.
